This is a comfortable shirt and good quality. I ordered this in mist green, size large, and I'm really pleased with it. At 6' and 194 lbs, it fits me perfectly – not too tight, not too loose. The fabric is medium weight, which makes it ideal for early fall or spring. If you prefer a snugger fit, just a heads up that it could be a bit see-through. The sleeves are just the right length for me, and although the color is slightly darker than the picture, I actually like it better that way. Overall, a solid, versatile shirt that I'll definitely get a lot of use out off.
